import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List asset inventory types (POST)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/inventory/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns all available asset inventory types for the tenant. This POST variant accepts filter parameters in the request body and is functionally equivalent to [GET /api/v1.0/assets/inventory/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-inventory-types).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Filtering and pagination options for retrieving asset inventory types.","properties":{"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional product identifier to filter by."}},"title":"GetAssetInventoryTypesRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Asset inventory types retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"ListGetResponse envelope containing a collection of asset inventory types.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Standard response envelope for paginated list operations. Contains an array of items plus pagination metadata.","properties":{"Items":{"type":"array","description":"Array of entities returned by the query. page returned in the response.","example":0}},"title":"PagingMetadata"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object","description":"Pagination details including total rows, page count, and current module."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the inventory type was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the inventory type was last modified."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the inventory type has been soft-deleted."}},"required":["AssetInventoryTypeId","Name"],"example":{"AssetInventoryTypeId":"646443ba-8d0b-4dfa-b3c4-16afd540064d","Name":"Tracked","Description":"Assets that are individually tracked with asset tags","SortOrder":10},"title":"AssetInventoryType"}}},"title":"AssetInventoryTypeListResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
